Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [price]>=(0)

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: len(replace([reviewContent],' ',''))>(0)

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: [reviewScore]>=(0)

Property.Name: CheckExpressionScript
Property.Value: datediff(year,[birthdate],getdate())>(13) AND datediff(year,[birthDate],getdate())<(100)

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @generatedSalt NVARCHAR(8) DECLARE @randVal SMALLINT DECLARE @i SMALLINT SET @i = 0; WHILE @i < 8 BEGIN SET @randVal = (SELECT RandomNb FROM V_RandomNb) SET @generatedSalt = CONCAT(@generatedSalt, @randVal) SET @i = @i + 1; END
RETURN @generatedSalt END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[SF_GenerateSalt] () RETURNS CHAR(8) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN RETURN HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CONCAT(SUBSTRING(@salt,0,4), @password, SUBSTRING(@salt, 4,4))) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @idUser INT, @salt CHAR(8) SET @salt = [dbo].SF_GenerateSalt()
INSERT INTO [User] ([firstname], [lastname], [email], [avatar], [login], [isAdmin], [birthdate], [salt], [password]) --OUTPUT inserted.idUser VALUES (@firstname, @lastname, @email, @avatar, @login, @isAdmin, @birthdate, @salt, [dbo].SF_PassWordEncryption(@password, @salt)) SET @idUser = @@IDENTITY

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT dbo.Book.idBook, dbo.Book.title, COALESCE (AVG(dbo.Review.reviewScore), 0) AS averageScore, dbo.Book.picture, dbo.Book.summary, dbo.Book.firstRelease, dbo.Book.idAudience FROM dbo.Book LEFT JOIN dbo.Review ON dbo.Book.idBook = dbo.Review.idBook GROUP BY dbo.Book.idBook, dbo.Book.title, dbo.Book.picture, dbo.Book.summary, dbo.Book.firstRelease, dbo.Book.idAudience

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.V_BookRating AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP (5) dbo.Review.idReview, dbo.Review.idUser, dbo.Review.idBook, dbo.Review.reviewDate, dbo.Review.reviewContent, dbo.Review.reviewScore, dbo.Book.title, dbo.[User].login FROM dbo.Review INNER JOIN dbo.[User] ON dbo.Review.idUser = dbo.[User].idUser INNER JOIN dbo.Book ON dbo.Review.idBook = dbo.Book.idBook ORDER BY dbo.Review.reviewDate DESC

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.V_MostRecentReviews AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP (1) dbo.BookAuthor.idBook, dbo.Book.picture, dbo.Book.title, dbo.Book.summary, dbo.Author.firstname, dbo.Author.lastname FROM dbo.Author INNER JOIN dbo.BookAuthor ON dbo.Author.idAuthor = dbo.BookAuthor.idAuthor INNER JOIN dbo.Book ON dbo.BookAuthor.idBook = dbo.Book.idBook ORDER BY NEWID()

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.V_RandomBook AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT FLOOR(RAND()*10) AS RandomNb

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[V_RandomNb] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT dbo.UserBook.idBook, dbo.UserBook.idUser, dbo.Book.title, dbo.[User].login, CASE WHEN dbo.UserBook.readingStatus = 0 THEN ' lire' WHEN dbo.UserBook.readingStatus = 1 THEN 'Lu' ELSE 'En cours de lecture' END AS readingStatus FROM dbo.UserBook INNER JOIN dbo.Book ON dbo.UserBook.idBook = dbo.Book.idBook INNER JOIN dbo.[User] ON dbo.UserBook.idUser = dbo.[User].idUser

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.V_ReadingStatus AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT dbo.Review.idUser, dbo.Review.reviewDate, dbo.Review.reviewContent, dbo.Review.reviewScore, dbo.[User].avatar, dbo.[User].login, dbo.Review.idBook FROM dbo.Review INNER JOIN dbo.[User] ON dbo.Review.idUser = dbo.[User].idUser

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW dbo.V_UserReview AS
